name: Simmder
description:
How much do you care about other people?

Simmder is a dating-app minigame centered interactive experience. In a world where relations have become ephemeral and everyone is on a selfish journey to please itself, are you really any different?

Perhaps you are going to find some undesirable truths about yourself in this process.

Less games, more love.

A game by Leonardo Bittencourt & Eduardo Prox

Songs by:

MathGrant
Rolemusic
Visager
Komiku
